name: MyDailyStory
0:
”Alexa, open My daily Story”
”Alexa, ask My daily Story for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start My daily Story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my daily story
des:
Help your kids build a lifetime love of reading with free audiobook stories from children's publisher, Xist Publishing. 
Our mission is to create books that inspire discovery and delight in toddlers through ten-year-olds. We're committed to sharing stories with kids that will help them grow into kind and curious individuals who love reading, no matter what form it takes. 
Each day, your children can listen to one of our audiobook story editions. We provide a wide selection of stories for kids from 3-10 featuring fiction and non-fiction texts. 
All of these stories are suitable for bedtime, car rides, rest time, nap time and more. 
Each story has been professionally recorded to give your kids an ideal listening experience. All of our books are also available in paperback and Kindle editions. Kids can read along with our books on Kindles or other devices.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
